QuestData.Title: Eradicating the Zan'thik
QuestData.Description: The warriors of Zan'vess are some of the most feared and respected in the empire, for good reason.$B$BImpalers are unmatched in their mastery of the polearm - no doubt Malik trained among the Zan'thik in his time. Their manipulators command terrifying sonic power with the ease and subtlety of a breath.$B$BBoth will need to be dealt with.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 6 Zan'thik Impalers and 6 Zan'thik Manipulators in Zan'vess.
